channel.title: Pokemon Deluge
channel.description: Pokemon! It's okay i guess. It has all regions (unova, Hoenn etc) You Can get legendary pokemon such as reshiram, Shaymin, groudon etc if you have defeated all of the gym leaders Link: http://www.delugerpg.com/

item.title: Pokemon Deluge
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Lol, i had zekrom and groudon and arceus (in all forms) but i gave that acc to my friend
Although i can still get it back It’s lots of fun when you’re bored.

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon Deluge
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I’ve played online Pokemon games before, they’re fun but a lot of them are sketchy. I ended up training only my Charmander and he evolved and I got him to like level ~20 before I even fought Brock; I somehow got hacked for him (while having a safe PC). This looks pretty fun though.

Read full topic
